overview: Quinton thinks he has found his dream girl in Silvia - someone who wants a casual, sexual relationship and isnt interested in getting too serious. But, after he cancels plans on her she immediately turns from dream girl to nightmare - blowing up his phone and stalking his ex-girlfriend, Lacy. As Quinton grows increasingly disturbed by Silvias stalking - he turns to Lacy for both comfort and support. Lacy, in a committed relationship herself finds herself unable to resist Quintons charms - but as the two grow closer things begin to spiral more and more out of control.
title: Deceived
